# Guide

The [`Config.host`](../src/lib.rs#Config.host) field sets the server address.

The [`Message.Quit`](../src/lib.rs#Message.Quit) variant stops the handler.

The [`Handler.handle`](../src/lib.rs#Handler.handle) method processes messages.

The [`ServerConfig.host`](../src/app.ts#ServerConfig.host) property configures the host.

The [`App.render`](../src/app.ts#App.render) method draws the UI.

The [`Status.Active`](../src/app.ts#Status.Active) member represents an active state.

The [`Direction.Up`](../src/app.ts#Direction.Up) member points upward.
